short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Berry is a browser extension that evaluates grocery products when you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Berry is your ideal online grocery shopping nutrition tool!

Save time, find healthy foods, and discover new brands with Berry. 

Select your specific macronutrients and ingredient needs and Berry will recommend the healthiest products for you. Spend less time stressing about your groceries and more time eating healthy products you enjoy. 

Instantly upgrade your grocery shopping experience with automated product nutritional information, comparison, and recommendation. All layered on your shopping screen! 
Simply tell us your preferences and health needs upon signing up and Berry will do the rest.

The Berry Benefits:
Tailored healthy and inexpensive product recommendations 
Accessible nutritional information
Simplified and smarter grocery shopping experience 

All with the convenience of online grocery shopping!

Currently functional on Shoprite, Amazon Fresh, FreshDirect, and Walmart.
